Package com.darkender.plugins.regionapi

Class Region

java.lang.Object
com.darkender.plugins.regionapi.Region
public class Region
extends Object
Wrapper around a region file containing convenience methods to read data

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Region​(File regionFile)
    Create a Region object reading from a region file and initializes location and modification tables

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close()
    Closes the RandomAccessFile used to read the region data
    byte[] getChunkCompressedData​(int sectorOffset)
    Gets the compressed chunk data at the specified offset
    int getChunkSize​(int chunkX, int chunkZ)
    Gets exact compressed chunk size in bytes
    int getLength​(int chunkX, int chunkZ)
    Gets the length value from the location table
    byte[] getLocations()
    Get the location table
    int getOffset​(int chunkX, int chunkZ)
    Gets the offset value from the location table
    byte[] getTimestamps()
    Get the timestamp table

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Region

      public Region​(File regionFile) throws IOException
      Create a Region object reading from a region file and initializes location and modification tables
      Parameters:
      regionFile - The region file to read from
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws if there is an exception reading from the file

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Closes the RandomAccessFile used to read the region data
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws if there is an exception closing the file

    • getOffset

      public int getOffset​(int chunkX, int chunkZ)
      Gets the offset value from the location table
      Parameters:
      chunkX - The (relative) chunk X coordinate
      chunkZ - The (relative) chunk Z coordinate
      Returns:
      The offset value from the location table
      See Also:
      https://wiki.vg/Region_Files#Location_Table

    • getLength

      public int getLength​(int chunkX, int chunkZ)
      Gets the length value from the location table
      Parameters:
      chunkX - The (relative) chunk X coordinate
      chunkZ - The (relative) chunk Z coordinate
      Returns:
      The length value from the location table
      See Also:
      https://wiki.vg/Region_Files#Location_Table

    • getChunkCompressedData

      public byte[] getChunkCompressedData​(int sectorOffset) throws IOException
      Gets the compressed chunk data at the specified offset
      Parameters:
      sectorOffset - The sector offset (4096 bytes per sector) to begin reading from
      Returns:
      Byte array containing the compressed chunk data
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws if an exception occurred while reading data

    • getChunkSize

      public int getChunkSize​(int chunkX, int chunkZ) throws IOException
      Gets exact compressed chunk size in bytes
      Parameters:
      chunkX - The (relative) X coordinate of the chunk
      chunkZ - The (relative) Z coordinate of the chunk
      Returns:
      compressed chunk size in bytes
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws if an exception occurred while reading data

    • getLocations

      public byte[] getLocations()
      Get the location table
      Returns:
      The raw location table
      See Also:
      https://wiki.vg/Region_Files#Location_Table

    • getTimestamps

      public byte[] getTimestamps()
      Get the timestamp table
      Returns:
      The raw timestamp table
      See Also:
      https://wiki.vg/Region_Files#Timestamp_Table
